variations.template: It won't be affected by the spell or ability.
rts: It won't be affected by the spell or ability.

variations.template: A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at."
rts: A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at."

variations.template: It can be in any deck whose commander's color identity includes green.
rts: It can be in any deck whose commander's color identity includes green.

variations.template: Sacrificing an artifact for mana to activate an ability doesn't count.
rts: Sacrificing an artifact for mana to activate an ability doesn't count.

variations.template: You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for them.
rts: You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for them.

variations.template: The token is an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell."
